body:
> --mtime='2000-01-01 12:00:00Z' --owner=0 --group=0

These options wont work with bsd `tar`.
diff_hunk:
@@ -228,7 +228,11 @@ $($(1)_postprocessed): | $($(1)_staged)
 	$(AT)touch $$@
 $($(1)_cached): | $($(1)_dependencies) $($(1)_postprocessed)
 	$(AT)echo Caching $(1)...
-	$(AT)cd $$($(1)_staging_dir)/$(host_prefix); find . | sort | tar --no-recursion -czf $$($(1)_staging_dir)/$$(@F) -T -
+	$(AT)cd $$($(1)_staging_dir)/$(host_prefix); \
+	  find . ! -name '.stamp_postprocessed' -print0 | \
+	  LC_ALL=C sort -z | \
+	  tar --create --no-recursion --mtime='2000-01-01 12:00:00Z' --numeric-owner --owner=0 --group=0 --mode='u+rw,go+r-w,a+X' --null --files-from=- | \

body:
Updated 0dbda79750c05486c6b8fd847f93edc728885b2f -> 9046de8a4cbc3899fed9eae084115f423e7ac5bd ([pr21995.01](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr21995.01) -> [pr21995.02](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr21995.02), [diff](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/compare/pr21995.01..pr21995.02)):

- addressed @fanquake's [comment](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/21995#discussion_r635918206)
- reproducibility is limited to a certain environment only because we cannot expect the same environment among different systems that are used to build depends

diff_hunk:
@@ -228,7 +228,11 @@ $($(1)_postprocessed): | $($(1)_staged)
 	$(AT)touch $$@
 $($(1)_cached): | $($(1)_dependencies) $($(1)_postprocessed)
 	$(AT)echo Caching $(1)...
-	$(AT)cd $$($(1)_staging_dir)/$(host_prefix); find . | sort | tar --no-recursion -czf $$($(1)_staging_dir)/$$(@F) -T -
+	$(AT)cd $$($(1)_staging_dir)/$(host_prefix); \
+	  find . ! -name '.stamp_postprocessed' -print0 | \
+	  LC_ALL=C sort -z | \
+	  tar --create --no-recursion --mtime='2000-01-01 12:00:00Z' --numeric-owner --owner=0 --group=0 --mode='u+rw,go+r-w,a+X' --null --files-from=- | \

body: Urgh BSD `tar` compatibility really makes things harder... I guess we can still supply `--numeric-owner`, but not `--owner` or `--group`

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#22283](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/22283) (build: Replace $(AT) with .SILENT by dgoncharov)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
